meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or tidying up.
meanings.sent1: After the party, the saning of the house took hours.
meanings.sent2: She always does a thorough saning of her room every Saturday.
meanings.sent3: The saning of the garage revealed lost treasures hidden in the mess.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous saning of the kitchen turned it into a sparkling oasis.
meanings.sent5: The saning of the garden made it look like a picture-perfect paradise.

meanings.definition: The process of making something clean or orderly.
meanings.sent1: The saning of the classroom was a team effort by the students.
meanings.sent2: Regular saning of the workspace helps maintain productivity.
meanings.sent3: The saning of the bookshelves turned into a fun sorting game.
meanings.sent4: Her methodical saning of the files made them easy to find.
meanings.sent5: The saning of the car made it shine like new.

meanings.definition: The state of being free from dirt or disorder.
meanings.sent1: The saning of the hotel room left it spotless for the next guest.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the feeling of saning after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The saning of the closet revealed forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent4: The saning of the streets made the whole neighborhood look neater.
meanings.sent5: The saning of the beach made it a pristine paradise.
